body:
Im planning on getting a new skin and im also in the works of making a skin pack
so far these are the Skins that i have (1st 3 have been reshaded, but i kinda like
the last 1 also)

NOTE: my skinpack will be SAO themed so im planning on getting all the SAO character
skins, but i also put in some of my Kirito IRL edits down below in the picture)
Leave me some comments and suggestions down below
